data.title: Catholic University Advancement
data.text:
The Parents Council is a group of highly engaged parents who are dedicated to the mission of The Catholic University of America and seek to expand the opportunities available for today’s students. These parent-leaders make a meaningful, direct impact on undergraduate student life.

The Parents Council Mission

Catholic University and the Parents Council share a common goal: to build and sustain an environment of academic excellence, giving every student unfettered access to career guidance and support while providing extraordinary opportunities for research experience and personal growth — ultimately, building their potential to serve Church, nation, and world.

Who Can Join the Parents Council?

The Parents Council is open to all interested parents of current Catholic University undergraduate students. Council members hail from numerous cities and states nationwide.

Each member or parent-couple demonstrates exceptional leadership with an annually renewable contribution to Catholic University of at least $5,000. Make your gift now!

Parents Council Responsibilities

Parents Council members are among our most important ambassadors, representing Catholic University through a variety of community and family outreach activities and special events. Council responsibilities include:

Become a member with an annual $5,000 gift

Attend Parents Council meetings (fall and spring) and events

Host parent events and welcome receptions in your local area

Welcome new families to the community and mentor new and current parents

Foster relationships with current and prospective parents

Facilitate career development for students through internships and placements

Identify and recruit parents to join the Parents Council

Parents Council Benefits

Parents Council members have an unparalleled opportunity to make a difference for all Catholic University students and families through their volunteer commitment. Council membership provides:

Active involvement with your child’s school

Invitations to join University President Dr. Peter Kilpatrick for on- and off-campus events

Networking opportunities with other parent-leaders

Access to senior administrators to share ideas and strategic input regarding issues of importance for parents and students

Regular communication of updates sharing highlights of campus life and upcoming events

Focused engagement with University leadership on a regular basis

Recognition of your gift in the annual Honor Roll of donors and benefactors

Impact Philanthropy

There are additional opportunities to support and enrich the vibrancy of the academic mission of The Catholic University of America through endowed chairs, endowed scholarships, and campus facilities.
